mapper.select: select t.tag_id, t.tag_name from myblog.tb_article_tag at,myblog.tb_tag t where at.article_id = #{id} and at.tag_id = t.tag_id

select a.article_id, a.article_title, a.article_content, a.article_cover, a.is_top, a.create_time, c.category_id, c.category_name from myblog.tb_article a,myblog.tb_category c,myblog.tb_article_tag at where a.category_id = c.category_id and at.article_id = a.article_id and at.tag_id = #{tagId} order by a.is_top desc limit #{current},1;
